actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on the Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Immigration and Border Security.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Immigration Integrity, Security, and Enforcement

official_title: To limit the amount authorized to be appropriated to carry out chapter 2 of title IV of the Immigration and Nationality Act, relating to refugee resettlement.

summary.text: This bill amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to authorize a specified amount of appropriations for FY2017 and each subsequent fiscal year for refugee resettlement activities.

titles.title: To limit the amount authorized to be appropriated to carry out chapter 2 of title IV of the Immigration and Nationality Act, relating to refugee resettlement.
